function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient air filtration systems allowing for pathogen propagation","Impact":"Increased transmission of viruses and bacteria through ventilation and air-conditioning systems","Mitigation":"Installation of high-efficiency filters and continuous monitoring of indoor air pollution levels","Technologies":"HEPA filters, CO2 monitors, PM sensors","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality due to lack of monitoring and control of pollutants","Impact":"Worsened indoor air quality, increased exposure to indoor air pollutants, and potential deterioration of COVID-19 patients' health","Mitigation":"Continuous inspection of indoor air pollution levels and implementation of effective ventilation systems","Technologies":"CO2 monitors, ventilation systems, PM sensors","People":"Building occupants, especially COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Uncontrolled airflow between micro spaces leading to pathogen propagation","Impact":"Potential propagation of pollutants and viruses between micro spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of ventilation systems to control airflow between micro spaces, and the use of variable-speed ventilators in old buildings","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, variable-speed ventilators","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
